snippet.title: Mugen Senshi Valis Commerical [1987, FC]
snippet.description: A pretty crap port, the Famciom version of Valis for some reason got a fully animated commerical worthy of the Valis idea (blue haired highschool girl wearing a golden bikini wielding a magical sword). It wans't until the MegaDrive and PC Engine CD ports that Valis actually started to get semi-decent. Except for the English voice acting, which is pretty much the worst thing ever.
